rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0001
rows.name:
Masterpon was in good mood today.
Talked with Hana 16 times.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0002
rows.name:
Hana also talked with
Homura 31 times today.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0003
rows.name: What are you doing, Hana?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, Kagutsuchi!
Hana just writing diary.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0005
rows.name:
Hana decided to leave records of life,
just like Kagutsuchi!

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0006
rows.name:
But you can't be returned to a Core
Crystal like us, so you're not in danger
of losing your memories, are you?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0007
rows.name:
Hana's body is very complex device.
If important part damaged by attack,
memory could be corrupted.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0008
rows.name:
Ah, I see. At a glance, your body seems
practically flawless, but I suppose it
comes with its own troubles.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0009
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi right. It like Masterpon
often say - Hana's delicate body
always in need of TLC!

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0010
rows.name:
Tora...says that to you, does he?
...Remind me to have a word
with him later.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0011
rows.name: Um, Kagutsuchi...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0012
rows.name:
Can Hana ask why Kagutsuchi care so
much about preserving past memories?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0014
rows.name:
Hana started diary, but never know
what to write. Maybe Kagutsuchi can help.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0015
rows.name: What should I tell her?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0016
rows.name: I don't want to lose myself forever.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0017
rows.name: I want to keep being the same person.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0101
rows.name:
If Kagutsuchi not have diary,
no more Kagutsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0102
rows.name:
Hana thought even if Kagutsuchi go back
to Core Crystal, just need to find new
Driver and then Kagutsuchi come back.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0103
rows.name: But is that really true?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0104
rows.name:
If I were to return to my Crystal and
remain that way for a long time...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0105
rows.name:
By the time I was reawakened, all
who knew me could be long gone.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0106
rows.name:
If the Kagutsuchi who lived through that
time no longer exists in my memories
or the memories of others...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0107
rows.name:
Who's to say that I existed
in that time at all?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0108
rows.name: Hmmmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0109
rows.name: Might be difficult to prove, that true.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0110
rows.name:
If nobody knows of my existence,
I may as well not have existed.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0111
rows.name: That thought...it troubles me.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0112
rows.name:
After all, it's the time I spend
with those dear to me that
makes me who I am.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0113
rows.name:
The happy memories, the sad ones.
All of them together. Without them,
I don't think I would be myself.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0114
rows.name:
To lose all of that forever...it would be
like denying not only myself, but the
people I spent those times with.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0115
rows.name:
Masterpon teach Hana many things.
Hana not want to forget all that.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0116
rows.name:
Masterpon pour everything into
making Hana!

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0117
rows.name:
Precisely. So if you hold him dear,
a diary filled with memories of him
should be just as precious.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0118
rows.name:
Because memories are what connect us
to others, and to the world we live in.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0119
rows.name:
Hana think Hana understand.
Will try best to write good diary!

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0120
rows.name:
Will fill diary with memories of
everyone! Even Kagutsuchi!

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0121
rows.name:
That's very kind of you, Hana.
I'm sure your diary will be wonderful.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0201
rows.name: Meh-meh?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0202
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi is Kagutsuchi. Why would Kagutsuchi
be somebody else?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0203
rows.name:
Well, imagine if one day you were to
forget all your memories of Tora, and
start working for a new master.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0204
rows.name:
Would that Hana still be the same
Hana I am talking to right now?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0205
rows.name: Hmmmm... Hana is Hana...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0206
rows.name:
But that Hana would be new
Masterpon's Hana. Not the same
as Tora's Hana.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0207
rows.name:
Probably would not even wear
frilly maid outfits.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0208
rows.name:
I...see. Well, maid outfits aside,
do you see what I'm getting at?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0209
rows.name:
While my past selves are all Kagutsuchi,
they are all different Brighids. Living
different lives, with different people.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0210
rows.name:
They're not directly connected to
the person I am today.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0211
rows.name: Yes... Hana think Hana understand.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0212
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi want to keep being this Kagutsuchi.
That why leave diary full of memories.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0213
rows.name: Precisely.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0214
rows.name:
Even if I return to my Core Crystal
and lose my memories...

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0215
rows.name:
By reading my diary, my new self
can hold on to some part of the
person I am today.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0216
rows.name:
Though of course, this relies on the
assumption that Superbia will pass
my diary on to my new self.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0217
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi... How can Hana make sure
Hana's diary gets passed down?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0218
rows.name:
A good question... Tora isn't the
most reliable fellow, is he?

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0219
rows.name:
Masterpon would use diary as pillow
for naps and for prop up wobbly table.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0220
rows.name:
Perhaps you should take the time
to think of the best solution to that
problem yourself.

rows.label: kizunatalk041_msg0221
rows.name:
Not only writing memories every day,
but also finding best way to preserve...
Diary is quite difficult task!
